channel.title: More people?
channel.description: Well I have a server that a lot of people like... But i have one problem... When i get about 12 people on my server I get this Java Heap Space Message or something in the Compiler... And then no more people can join... So i restart the server only to get the people who werent able to get on before complaining about not being able to get on and stuff... How can i be able to get more people on my server instead of it only being 12? I also heard of something called like worlds or something? Can someone explain that to me aswell?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 26, 2008, 01:58:14 pm[/size][hr]I am guessing no one knows the answer to my question? Even just an idea could help me...[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 26, 2008, 03:45:09 pm[/size][hr]Please someone help me!!! I would greatly appreciate it!!!!

item.title: More people?
item.dc:creator: @geraldo_love geraldo love
item.description:
@geraldo_love wrote:

Well I have a server that a lot of people like… But i have one problem… When i get about 12 people on my server I get this Java Heap Space Message or something in the Compiler… And then no more people can join… So i restart the server only to get the people who werent able to get on before complaining about not being able to get on and stuff… How can i be able to get more people on my server instead of it only being 12? I also heard of something called like worlds or something? Can someone explain that to me aswell?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 26, 2008, 01:58:14 pm[/size][hr]I am guessing no one knows the answer to my question? Even just an idea could help me…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 26, 2008, 03:45:09 pm[/size][hr]Please someone help me!!! I would greatly appreciate it!!!
